Thanks for your appreciative comments. I believe that when you start writing a shader and keep it private while working and then later change it to public it doesn't show as a new shader and thus easily missed :)
What Fabrice said. Also: this is gorgeous.

Thanks for the appreciative comments. This shader was inspired by looking at some amazing shaders at this site and stealing code from others.
Wow, this one is pretty good!
